member.name: IP_PER_ADAPTER_INFO
member.summary: TheIP_PER_ADAPTER_INFO structure contains information specific to a particular adapter.

member.name: IP_PER_ADAPTER_INFO.AutoconfigEnabled
member.summary: Specifies whether IP address auto-configuration (APIPA) is enabled on this adapter. See Remarks.

member.name: IP_PER_ADAPTER_INFO.AutoconfigActive
member.summary: Specifies whether this adapter's IP address is currently auto-configured by APIPA.

member.name: IP_PER_ADAPTER_INFO.CurrentDnsServer
member.summary: Reserved. Use the DnsServerList member to obtain the DNS servers for the local computer.

member.name: IP_PER_ADAPTER_INFO.DnsServerList
member.summary: A linked list of structures that specify the set of DNS servers used by the local computer.
